kpi.name: mgw_1116a

kpi_info.title: Average of IP backbone port capacity license usage ratio
kpi_info.use: Indicates the average usage ratio of IP backbone port capacity license MGW Nb IP backbone port capacity (Nb-IP-termination and Nb’-IP-termination) in the measured MGW

kpi.kpi_alias: Avg Nb-IP conn cap lic usage
